new_steps.description: Phase 1 — Remove parent project references from tests/test_migration.py: Rename test methods and rewrite assertion string literals to use generic terms or positive assertions. Replace all 11 occurrences.
Phase 2 — Remove parent project references from prd.json: Replace all parent_server/ paths with app_server/ in task descriptions for US-003, US-004, US-005 (3 occurrences on lines 38, 55, 72).
Phase 3 — Rewrite git history: Use git filter-branch to change author/committer email to claude-agent@dynamic-ralph.dev on all 5 commits. Then verify with git log.
Phase 4 — Verify: Run uv run pytest and uv run pre-commit run -a to confirm all tests pass and lint is clean. Run a recursive grep to confirm zero remaining occurrences of parent project references.
